column4: Hey guys. i'm a bit new at driver installation,, how do i get nvidia drivers that work well?

i have them, it gives me nvidia-glx-180 which is driver 180.44, i believe nvidia's drivers are up at 185.28.19, much newer with many fixes, and i have trouble with some opengl stuff with wine.. i was hoping newer drivers would help...
i believe debian is even shipping 185.18.x drivers.. much newer than ubuntu's
